entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 1:08 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: ENE 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm except 25 cm inland. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 this evening then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
